大湊警備府/津軽海峡/北海道東部: Ominato Guard District / Tsugaru Strait / Eastern Hokkaido
深海棲艦極東艦隊が北海道\n東部に来襲！陽動の可能性\nがあるが、各艦隊は直ちに: The Abyssal Far Eastern Fleet has launched an assault on Eastern Hokkaido! While it could be a diversion, all fleets must intercept immediately! Fleet, sortie!
北海道北東沖/宗谷海峡沖: Off Northeastern Hokkaido / Off Soya Strait
敵侵攻部隊の主力が稚内に\n上陸、南下を続けている。\n有力な増援兵力を輸送し、: The enemy's main invasion force has landed in Wakkanai and is advancing southward. Transport powerful reinforcements and intercept the enemy at Otoineppu!
北海道北東沖/留萌沖正面/樺太南部沖: Off Northeastern Hokkaido / Off Rumoi / Off Southern Sakhalin
敵侵攻主力が留萌方面へと\n上陸を開始した！我が連合\n艦隊主力を同敵橋頭堡へと: The enemy's main invasion force has begun landing in the Rumoi area! Our main fleet will break into the enemy beachhead! Defend Hokkaido!
カムラン湾沖/昭南方面航路/南シナ海: Cam Ranh Bay Sea / Shōnan Area Route / South China Sea
南沙諸島沖の戦雲: Clouds of War off the Spratly Islands
敵深海勢力がミンドロ島へ\nの上陸侵攻を開始！これに\n対応するために、南西方面: The Abyssal forces have begun a landing invasion on Mindoro Island! Deploy fleet forces from the southwest region to counter this threat!
ミンドロ島沖/キャビテ沖/サンホセ沖: Mindoro Sea / Cavite Sea / San Jose Sea
ミンドロ島への反撃作戦の\n中核となる礼号作戦部隊は\n敵サンホセ泊地へ突入！\: The Reigō Operation Force, the core of the counteroffensive against Mindoro Island, is advancing into the enemy anchorage at San Jose! Destroy the enemy supply depots!
南沙諸島沖/カムラン湾沖: Spratly Islands Sea / Cam Ranh Bay Sea
第二遊撃部隊の帰投: Return of the Second Strike Force
礼号作戦部隊は見事作戦を\n成功させ帰投中！第四航空\n戦隊は同隊を収容し、追撃: The Reigō Operation Force has successfully completed its mission and is returning! The 4th Air Squadron will provide cover and annihilate the pursuing enemy task force!
第百四戦隊、抜錨！\n釧路方面を哨戒せよッ！:
104th Squadron, weigh anchor!
Patrol the Kushiro area!
第一艦隊、警戒を厳に！\n侵攻する敵戦力を撃滅せよッ！:
First Fleet, maintain strict vigilance!
Annihilate the invading enemy forces!
艦隊、第三戦速！\n対潜警戒を厳にッ！: Fleet, third battle speed! Maintain strict anti-submarine vigilance!
第一艦隊、警戒しつつ前進！\n第五艦隊突入を援護せよッ！:
First Fleet, advance with caution!
Support the Fifth Fleet's breakthrough!
第五艦隊、出撃ッ！\n稚内方面への侵攻を阻止せよ！:
Fifth Fleet, sortie!
Prevent the invasion toward Wakkanai!
第五艦隊、宗谷海峡へ突入！\n稚内に侵攻する上陸船団を討てッ！:
Fifth Fleet, Advance into the Sōya Strait!
Destroy the Landing Convoy
     Invading Wakkanai!
留萌正面に上陸中の敵艦隊発見！\n全艦突撃する！蹴散らせッ！:
Enemy fleet spotted
landing at the Rumoi front!     
All ships, charge! Crush them!
天塩方面の敵勢力を一掃する！\n連合艦隊、面舵一杯！前進ッ！:
Eliminate enemy forces
in the Teshio area! Combined Fleet,     
hard to starboard! Advance!
敵侵攻部隊、旗艦艦隊を叩くッ！\n連合艦隊、合戦用意！我に続け！:
Strike the enemy invasion
force's flagship fleet! Combined Fleet,     
battle stations! Follow me!
艦隊、前進！ 敵制圧圏内、ミンドロ島沖の\n敵情偵察を実施せよ！:
Fleet, advance! Conduct enemy
reconnaissance off the coast of Mindoro
     Island within the enemy-controlled zone!
敵制圧圏を突破、前線水上機基地への補給作戦\nを実施する！艦隊、水上及び対空警戒:
Break through the enemy-controlled zone and
carry out a supply operation to the frontline
     seaplane base! Fleet, maintain vigilance!
礼号作戦部隊、これよりミンドロ島敵制圧圏に\n突入する！対潜、対空警戒も厳とせよ:
Reigō Operation Force, now entering the
enemy-controlled zone of Mindoro Island!
     Maintain strict vigilance! Advance!
礼号作戦部隊は、これよりミンドロ島\n敵泊地への突入を敢行する！ 続けッ！:
Reigō Operation Force will now commence
an assault on the enemy anchorage at
     Mindoro Island! Keep going!
